title: Women with ADHD: The Complete Guide to Stay Organized, Overcome Distractions, and Improve Relationships. Manage Your Emotions, Finances, and Succeed in Life
features: Is a distracted and scattered mind preventing you from securing the life you deeply desire?
You’re not alone. For many women just like you, the biggest obstacle on their path to self-actualization is their own mind. ADHD isn’t just for young boys anymore.
Women from age twenty-four to thirty-six are now the fastest-growing population diagnosed and treated for ADHD today
. While women are 4 times less likely to get diagnosed than men, research has shown that
ADHD causes a greater toll on women

due to societal pressure and internalizing their struggles.Maybe you always knew your brain worked differently. It’s possible that thoughts seem to enter your mind, shuffle, and move on at incredible speed. Maybe you’ve always found yourself interested in many things, unable to focus and build upon one.You’re probably incredibly creative but find it difficult to distill that focus into consistent effort. Despite the challenges ADHD might bring you, it is still possible to achieve your goals efficiently and live the life you want!
In the illuminating guide, “Women with ADHD” you’ll learn about:
✓ Signs and symptoms of ADHD that may have gone unnoticed.
✓ The role of Executive Function in the hyperactive mind.
✓ ADHD’s effect on social dysfunction and anxiety.
✓ Step-By-Step methods to declutter your life by defining your target areas.
✓ Isolation and friendships for those with ADHD.
✓ Improving relationships and choosing romantic partners that complement your mind.
✓ Career paths vs. “pay the bills” jobs and the advantages of both.
✓ Becoming intelligent with your spending habits.
✓ And much more!

If you are a woman with attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder, you’ve learned that the way you think, and act might not be what society would label as “correct”. In this breakthrough guide, you’ll be enlightened to the truth that is:
there is no such thing as correct!
Although ADHD can present difficulties that others may have the privilege of avoiding, you can learn to work with – and LOVE – the way your mind works.
Scroll up and hit “Buy Now” to finally learn how.
description: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐  Finally! A book that gets right to the solution!

"This cleverly written, highly useful book starts off helping right out of the gate. It employs copious amounts of practical advice, bulleted lists and short, informative passages throughout. Super easy to read and also to apply its advice to my daily life activities. Finally a book that I find immediately helpful. I love that!"
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐  Great collection of information for women

"It was a nice succinct review of research specific to women, with practical guidance on how to deal with ADHD on a daily basis. Would definitely recommend it if you suspect you may have undiagnosed ADHD or want some strategies to supplement other treatments (like therapy or medication)."

" I am 25 years old, was recently diagnosed with ADHD, and this book is SO helpful! Not only did it validate my feelings and struggles as a WOMAN with ADHD, but it taught me ways to work through what I feel like gets in the way of my success! Highly recommended for women with ADHD!"

"This may be one of the best books about women with ADHD. I was not diagnosed until my 40s and for many years thought something was wrong with me because I could not keep track of time, needed reminders for everything, and had extreme difficulty focusing. I wish I had had this book several years ago before my diagnosis; however, I still found it extremely helpful."

"The authors clearly know their stuff and did their homework. ADHD is clearly a huge problem in our society and this well-organized and well-written book provides a glimpse into how women can overcome this debilitating mental illness."
